column4: hi, just got a new dell vostro 3550, trying to setup ubuntu lucid, but unable to find drivers
what drivers? Is something not working?
warfaren, why? What is the problem?
does it not work after install?
my display sucks right now, not able to increase it to the screen's full resolution, need the driver for that
wireless not working at all though
lspci | grep Network  gives the output : Network controller: Intel Corporation Device 008a (rev 34)
try installing these packages but with your kernel number: http://ubuntuforums.org/showpost.php?p=10694483&postcount=9
did you try what the link i sent said?
yes, i ran 'xrandr' and the options it gave me were only 800x600 and 1024x768
